application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to condition 39 (GLA's Whole Life Carbon Assessment), of Variation of Conditions application reference 22/3123 dated 09/06/2023 for Variation of conditions 2 (approved drawings/documents), 3 (residential units), 4 (commercial floor space), 5 (building regulations), 11 (blue badge parking bays), 13 (windows), 15 (energy centre), 17 (flood risk assessment), 18 (ecology and biodiversity), 19 (noise report), 20 (car park management plan) and 21 (fire statement) of planning permission 21/2989 dated 25 March 2022 (as amended by 22/2665) for Demolition and redevelopment of the site to provide residential units, retail floorspace and workspace / storage floorspace, private and communal amenity space, car parking, cycle parking, ancillary space, mechanical plant, landscaping and other associated works (phased development), subject to a deed of agreement dated 24/03/2022 and a deed of variation dated 08/06/2023 under Section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.This application is subject to an Environmental Statement.
site_name: Former Ex Euro House, Fulton Road, Wembley
